segments.text: Over to the left, I see two children involved in some secret activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is climbing on a two-step stool, reaching for a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is clearly labeled "COOKIE JAR" and it's full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched right up, one hand in the jar, the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My goodness, that stool looks incredibly unstable!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, and it appears to be tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall at any second, it's quite a precarious position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His accomplice, a little girl, stands below, arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their mission, oblivious to the water at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood moment, sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is entirely unaware of their daring plan unfolding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't completely tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR
